scripts.dev: VITE_ENV=local nx run-many -t dev -p shell react-app vue-app angular-app dev
scripts.preview:dev: VITE_ENV=dev pnpm build:dev && VITE_ENV=dev pnpm --filter=shell --filter=react-app preview
scripts.check:all:local: VITE_ENV=local pnpm build:dev && VITE_ENV=dev pnpm --filter=shell --filter=react-app preview
